channel.title: CVE Feed for Don Crowther -- 3xSocializer (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Don Crowther -- 3xSocializer (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-29419|2024-08-03T06:17:55.266Z -- don%20crowther -- 3xsocializer%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: SQL Injection (SQLi) vulnerability in Don Crowther's 3xSocializer plugin <= 0.98.22 at WordPress possible for users with a low role like a subscriber or higher.
